## toRecord() function

Generates key value list from an array of objects

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function toRecord<T extends {
    [K in keyof T]: any;
}, K extends keyof T>(array: Array<T>, key: K): Record<K, T>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  array | Array&lt;T&gt; |  |
|  key | K |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

Record&lt;K, T&gt;

record
